ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC
“WICKED GAME,” Part One
The new story arc of MARCO B. BUCCI and JACOPO CAMAGNI’s genre-bending saga opens with a bang! Becky Kumar’s literal leap of faith unhinged the doors to a world of magic, and now everyone in Manhattan can see their reality is just a piece of a bigger picture. Is it the end of the Secret? Also, the face-off we’ve been waiting for since the first issue: the Witch vs. the King, with Fer and the Wild Hunt somewhere in the middle. Oh, and who are those FOUR other Beckys, by the way?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jacopo Camagni (a) & Stefano Martinuz (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Fabio Mancini | 2 |
